md:
giải nghĩa từ "fellowship" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ đồng nghĩa.

* Fellowship (noun)
	+ Meaning: A group of people who share common interests or activities.
	+ Vietnamese translation: Câu lạc bộ, hội nhóm
	+ Example sentence: The fellowship of gamers gathered at the convention center to play the latest video games.
	+ Related words: community, club, organization
	+ Synonyms: association, society, fraternity

* Fellowship (noun)
	+ Meaning: A grant or stipend awarded to a student or researcher to support their studies or research.
	+ Vietnamese translation: Học bổng, trợ cấp
	+ Example sentence: She received a fellowship to pursue her Ph.D. in biology at a prestigious university.
	+ Related words: scholarship, grant, award
	+ Synonyms: stipend, bursary, subsidy

* Fellowship (noun)
	+ Meaning: A feeling of friendship and mutual support among people.
	+ Vietnamese translation: Tình hữu nghị, tình cảm thân thiết
	+ Example sentence: The fellowship among the team members helped them to overcome the challenges they faced.
	+ Related words: camaraderie, companionship, solidarity
	+ Synonyms: friendship, amity, harmony
html:
giải nghĩa từ "fellowship" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ đồng nghĩa.

  • Fellowship (noun)

    • Meaning: A group of people who share common interests or activities.
    • Vietnamese translation: Câu lạc bộ, hội nhóm
    • Example sentence: The fellowship of gamers gathered at the convention center to play the latest video games.
    • Related words: community, club, organization
    • Synonyms: association, society, fraternity

  • Fellowship (noun)

    • Meaning: A grant or stipend awarded to a student or researcher to support their studies or research.
    • Vietnamese translation: Học bổng, trợ cấp
    • Example sentence: She received a fellowship to pursue her Ph.D. in biology at a prestigious university.
    • Related words: scholarship, grant, award
    • Synonyms: stipend, bursary, subsidy

  • Fellowship (noun)

    • Meaning: A feeling of friendship and mutual support among people.
    • Vietnamese translation: Tình hữu nghị, tình cảm thân thiết
    • Example sentence: The fellowship among the team members helped them to overcome the challenges they faced.
    • Related words: camaraderie, companionship, solidarity
    • Synonyms: friendship, amity, harmony
